metadata.description: Alexander's lifetime Claude Code ecosystem with plugins for CI verification, code review, and intelligent commits.

plugins.name: autonomous-ci
plugins.description: Utilities and skills to verify CI locally and monitor GitHub Actions runs.

plugins.name: code-review
plugins.description: Automated code review with security scanning, style checking, and improvement suggestions.

plugins.name: smart-commit
plugins.description: Intelligent commit message generation with semantic analysis and conventional commits enforcement.

plugins.name: jules-integration
plugins.description: Integration with Google Jules AI coding agent for async task delegation via API.

plugins.name: testcontainers-dotnet
plugins.description: Testcontainers for .NET integration testing patterns and best practices.
